Pre-Game Insights: France ran out convincing 3-0 victors over Luxembourg in their first fixture of the month.
Canada was crushed 4-0 by the Netherlands on Thursday evening.
Kylian Mbappe had a direct hand in all three goals for France in their last match, taking his assists tally for the national team to 27.
Canada's only victory in their last six matches came against Trinidad and Tobago in March.
Canada faces a shorter recuperation time compared to their Euro 2024 hopefuls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: France's record-breaking 14-0 annihilation of Gibraltar in Euro 2024 qualifying.
Canada's first-ever meeting with France in a World Cup match in 1986 ended in a 1-0 win for France.
Deschamps's men have won their last eight home matches without conceding a goal.
